messages.subject: Takahata Fudou photos
messages.msgSnippet: I ve uploaded to group s photo section some photos I ve taken yesterday at Takahata Fudou Temple. There was a ceremony of Setsubun cerebrating th eve before
messages.messageBody:
I've uploaded to group's photo section some photos I've taken yesterday at
Takahata Fudou Temple.
There was a ceremony of Setsubun cerebrating th eve before the beginning of
spring,and this year Takahata Fudou invited Koji Yamamoto and Takashi Kobayashi
( NHK Hijikata & Genzaburo Inoue) to throw the soy beans.
That was too difficult to catch those beans thrown by them, and the photo are
rather small and blurry, however I have another time to have some fangirlish
fun.
I hope you enjoy seeing them.

About Setsubun ceremony
http://www.embjapan.dk/Spotlight2/Setsubun.htm
http://www.japan-guide.com/e/e2285.html

Takahata Fudo site
http://www.takahatafudoson.or.jp/

Tama


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
